verbs.description: [ARG1: piedmont man] [V: dies] [ARGM-LOC: in plane crash] an oklahoma city business owner was killed wednesday when the aerobatic plane he was piloting crashed at the el reno municipal air park drew stephens 45 of 4610 trails end in piedmont died in the fiery crash he was the owner of hammer and dolly auto repair 904 n miller in oklahoma city stephens also was a former boyfriend of karen silkwood his role in her life was included in the movie silkwood air park manager rick mullaney said stephens was a member of an area chapter of the national aerobatics club and was practicing for competitions piedmont alabama karen silkwood art federal aviation administration el reno oklahoma silkwood oklahoma city rick mullaney john clabes el reno municipal air park
